name: Stylized Spell Mastery
text: You have altered your understanding of a select number of spells
prerequisites: Spell Mastery, Stylized Spell, Bluff 5 ranks, Spellcraft 5 ranks.
benefit: You do not modify the spell slot used when applying the Stylized Spell metamagic feat to any spell you have mastered with Spell Mastery.
normal: A stylized spell uses up a spell slot 1 higher than the spellâ€™s actual level.
